title: 358: CHATTY BROS: Bachelor Parties, Relationship Advice, & Bach Recaps!
itunes:title: 358: CHATTY BROS: Bachelor Parties, Relationship Advice, & Bach Recaps!
description:
The Bros are back and they are discussing restaurant invitation etiquette, bachelor parties, Grayston defends Bekah, they answer some great relationship questions from the #broadsquad, a “how to ask someone out” motivational pep talk, and cover Clayton’s most recent shenanigans! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DIET SMOKE (2 MIN): Go to DIETSMOKE.COM and use code CHATTY to get 20% off your entire order!

***GIRLFRIEND COLLECTIVE: Get $25 off your purchase of $100 or more when you go to GIRLFRIEND.COM/CHATTY

***FACTOR: Go to GO.FACTOR75.COM/CHATTY120 and use code CHATTY120 to get $120 off!

***REDECOR: Download Redecor for FREE on the App Store or Google Play Store!
